testingStandards.preparation: Device at 50% battery, background apps cleared, airplane mode during CPU tests
testingStandards.methodology: Minimum 5 benchmark runs, highest and lowest scores discarded, average of remaining 3 runs

geekbench6.relevance: Measures computational performance for app launches, multitasking

3dmakWildLifeExtreme.purpose: GPU performance and sustained gaming capability
3dmakWildLifeExtreme.relevance: Gaming performance, graphics rendering, AR/VR applications

antutu.purpose: Overall system performance including CPU, GPU, memory, UX
antutu.relevance: General system responsiveness and overall performance

gfxBenchManhattan.relevance: Gaming performance standardized across different screen resolutions

pcmarkWork.relevance: Office tasks, web browsing, photo editing workflow

geekbench6.notes: Leading single-core performance, excellent for app responsiveness

3dmakWildLife.notes: Excellent peak performance, thermal throttling under sustained load

realWorldTests.gaming: Genshin Impact: 58 fps average, drops to 45 fps after 30 minutes

geekbench6.notes: Solid performance, trails A17 Pro in single-core tasks

3dmakWildLife.notes: Consistent sustained performance with better thermal management

antutu.notes: Excellent overall performance, well-balanced across categories

realWorldTests.gaming: Genshin Impact: 55 fps average, maintains 52 fps after 30 minutes

geekbench6.notes: Slower than flagship competition, adequate for typical use

3dmakWildLife.notes: Gaming performance lags behind Snapdragon and A-series chips

antutu.notes: Performance gap evident in benchmarks, good for AI-specific tasks

realWorldTests.gaming: Genshin Impact: 42 fps average, drops to 33 fps after 20 minutes
realWorldTests.aiTasks: Photo processing with Magic Eraser: 2.3 seconds average

3dmakWildLife.notes: Good gaming performance, limited by 60Hz display

geekbench6.notes: Previous generation flagship performance, still very capable

3dmakWildLife.notes: Good gaming performance for the price point

realWorldTests.gaming: Handles most games well at high settings

batteryLifeResults.testingConditions: 50% screen brightness, 120Hz when available, Wi-Fi and 5G enabled, typical app mix

moderateUsage.description: Social media, messaging, web browsing, light photography
Social media, messaging, web browsing, light photography

heavyUsage.description: AI features heavily used, photography, streaming

moderateUsage.description: Typical usage with occasional AI features

chargingSpeedResults.testConditions: 0-50% and 0-100% charging times, room temperature, official chargers

wiredCharging.notes: Conservative charging speeds help battery longevity
USB-C enables faster charging than previous Lightning iPhones
Adaptive charging reduces speeds to preserve battery health

cameraPerformanceTests.testingConditions: Standardized lighting conditions, professional color checker, identical framing

weaknesses: Conservative processing may appear flat to some users
Can be too aggressive with HDR processing
Slower shutter can cause motion blur
Aggressive noise reduction can reduce detail

scenarios.title: Content Creator Daily Driver
scenarios.description: Heavy photography, video recording, social media posting, editing

results.performance: Excellent video quality, good photo processing speed, thermal throttling during 4K recording
results.batteryLife: Requires midday charge for full day

results.performance: Good overall performance, excellent battery optimization, vibrant photo processing
results.batteryLife: Easily lasts full day with moderate evening charge remaining
results.recommendation: Best balance for mixed content creation

results.performance: Outstanding photo processing, unique AI features, adequate video quality
results.batteryLife: Full day usage possible, AI features drain battery faster

scenarios.title: Business Professional
scenarios.description: Email, video calls, document editing, travel navigation

results.performance: Excellent app performance, seamless ecosystem integration, reliable connectivity
results.batteryLife: May need afternoon top-up during heavy usage days

results.performance: Good productivity features, DeX mode useful, excellent battery optimization
results.batteryLife: Easily lasts full business day with room to spare

results.performance: Excellent call screening, live translate features, good Google Workspace integration
results.batteryLife: Solid all-day performance for typical business use

performanceLeaders.sustained: Samsung Galaxy S24 (Snapdragon 8 Gen 3) - best thermal management

batteryLifeLeaders.overall: Samsung Galaxy S24 - 9.5 hours moderate usage
batteryLifeLeaders.efficiency: iPhone 15 Pro - best performance per mAh
batteryLifeLeaders.fastCharging: Google Pixel 8 Pro - 30W max (still slow vs Chinese competitors)

cameraLeaders.computational: Google Pixel 8 Pro - AI features unmatched
cameraLeaders.video: iPhone 15 Pro - industry standard for content creation
cameraLeaders.versatility: Samsung Galaxy S24 - best all-around camera system
cameraLeaders.lowLight: Google Pixel 8 Pro - Night Sight leads the industry
